item.title: 508 Ancient Alter
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Elvemage 0o, post:1, topic:253568”]I thoughti had the code right for when i click the ancient alter it switched for magic to magicks

heres my code…

case 6552: if (q1 == 14) { if (spellbook == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); spellbook = 1; } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); spellbook = 0; } Send("You convert your spellbook."); } break;

did i do soemthing wrong?

because when i click the alter it doesent do anything[/quote]
Are you sure you got the altar id right?
Edit: Wait, what is q1?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Ancient Alter
item.dc:creator: @Axed Axed
item.description:
@Axed wrote:

My code is

if (playerAncientMagics == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); playerAncientMagics = 0; } if (playerAncientMagics == 1 && q3 == 15) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); playerAncientMagics = 1; } if (playerAncientMagics == 2 && q10 == 15) { setSidebarInterface(6, 18787); playerAncientMagics = 2; }
Just add the last part and add the text you want :D, glad I could help if I did.

Read full topic
